name: The Perplexing Orb: Bounce N' Roll
name_original: The Perplexing Orb: Bounce N' Roll
description:
The Perplexing Orb returns in a brand new entry packed with new features! New art style, new levels, and new game play mechanics!



In this third entry to The Perplexing Orb franchise, you have the ability to bounce your way through all new challenges!

The game contains 40 all new story stages all designed around distance, height, and the ability to jump!



The game features an all new retro inspired art style with different graphical options. You can either play the game in crisp full HD or with a pixel filter to make the low poly art match closer to the PS1 era aesthetic!



INSANE Challenge Mode Levels make a return in this entry! Once you conquer the main story stages, brace yourself for 8 incredibly difficult stages to test your resolve!



Stage Designs are filled with all sorts of new obstacles and tools like cracking ice, elevators, moving platforms and more!



ALL NEW TIME TRIAL MODE.
Race for gold medal times OR test yourself against incredibly difficult dev times in the brand new time trial mode!
